item.description:
For people who like Chinese food, want to learn more Chinese culture, and meet friends. gives everyone an opportunity to come and make new friends, practice their Chinese or English, and enjoy brunch with us. Bring your friends, and come by, relax, practice in either language of your choice, and enjoy being part of our growing community.

I have class on that day morning. i will try to be on time. i will book the table on friday night. so ask front desk where our table is. looking forward to meeting there:)

We share the food, and we split the bill evenly.


For more Info. please check http://www.yelp.com/b...

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dim Sum in Quincy
